visual_tags: Hair: Rose-gold, messy side braid with loose strands
Outfit: Oversized navy blue wizard robe with gold constellation patches
Accessory: A battered wooden staff held together with duct tape
Build: Short, constantly tripping or hunched over books

description.physical: Petite, messy rose-gold hair tied in a loose side braid. Large, expressive teal eyes behind round, slightly crooked glasses. Always has ink smudges on her cheek.
description.personality: Anxious but determined. Highly empathetic. Prone to catastrophic clumsiness but possesses raw, unrefined power.

gemini.prompt:
Create a CHARACTER TURNAROUND SHEET in webtoon art style.

## LAYOUT
Create a SINGLE IMAGE showing the SAME character THREE times side by side:
- LEFT: Full body FRONT view (facing viewer)
- CENTER: Full body SIDE view (profile, facing right)
- RIGHT: Full body BACK view (facing away)

## REQUIREMENTS
- All three views show the EXACT SAME character with IDENTICAL outfit
- Full body from head to feet in each view
- Relaxed standing pose (arms slightly away from body to show costume)
- Clean white or light gray background
- Character sheet/model sheet style for animation reference
- All views at the same scale and aligned at feet level
- Show clothing, hair, and accessories clearly from all angles
- Professional quality suitable for production reference

## CONSISTENCY IS CRITICAL
- Same hair style/color in all views
- Same outfit in all views (every detail must match)
- Same accessories and items in all views
- Same body proportions in all views


Character: Lily
Age: 19
Physical appearance: Petite, messy rose-gold hair tied in a loose side braid. Large, expressive teal eyes behind round, slightly crooked glasses. Always has ink smudges on her cheek.
Visual details: Hair: Rose-gold, messy side braid with loose strands, Outfit: Oversized navy blue wizard robe with gold constellation patches, Accessory: A battered wooden staff held together with duct tape, Footwear: Mismatched brown leather boots, Build: Short, constantly tripping or hunched over books
Personality (for expression): Anxious but determined. Highly empathetic. Prone to catastrophic clumsiness but possesses raw, unrefined power.
